    #include<iostream>
    
    using namespace std;
    
    int main(){
        int t,x,y;
        cin>>t;
        do{
               cin>>x>>y;
               if(x==y){
                        if(x%2==0){
                                   cout<<2*x<<endl;
                                   }
                        else
                        {
                            cout<<(2*x)-1<<endl;
                        }
               }
               else if((x-y) == 2){
                    if(x%2==0){
                    cout<<(2+ ((x/2)-1)*4)<<endl;
                    }
                    else{
                         cout<<(3+ ((int(x/2))-1)*4)<<endl;
                         }
               }
               else{
                    cout<<"No Number"<<endl;
                    }
               t--;
               }while(t>0);
        return 0;
        }
